thread.title: Fed Appeals Court: You Have No Right To Own ‘Military-Style’ Weapons
thread.title_full: Fed Appeals Court: You Have No Right To Own ‘Military-Style’ Weapons

author: EdJenner
title: Fed Appeals Court: You Have No Right To Own ‘Military-Style’ Weapons
text:
Go to Article 
Horrible decision from the Federal Court of Appeals cutting back gun rights. The court has upheld a ban on ‘military style’ weapons. From Independent Journal Review: A federal appeals court in Maryland ruled Tuesday that semi-automatic rifles, commonly referred to as “military-style assault weapons,” are not protected under the Second Amendment. The ruling came after […]
